entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
